src_original: yaḥ sukhendriyeṇa samanvāgataḥ so 'vaśyaṃ caturbhirindriyaistaiśca tribhirupekṣādibhiḥ sukhendriyeṇa ca / [050/25]  yaḥ kāyendriyeṇa so 'pi caturbhistaiśca tribhiḥ kāyendriyeṇa ca / [051/01]  pañcabhiścakṣurādimān / [051/02]
tgt_original: 若成就眼根，彼定成就五，餘不定。
若成就身根，彼定成就四，餘不定。 若成就女根，彼定成就八，餘不定。

src_original: dvitīyadhyānajastṛtīyadhyānālābhī katamena sukhendriyeṇa samanvāgato bhavati / [051/07]  kliṣṭena tṛtīyadhyānabhūmikena / [051/08]
tgt_original: 男根，亦爾。 若成就命根，彼定成就三，餘不定。 意根、捨根，亦爾。

src_original: duḥkhī tu saptabhiḥ / [051/09]  yo duḥkhendriyeṇa so 'vaśyaṃ saptabhiḥ kāyajīvitamanobhiścaturbhirvedanendriyaiḥ / [051/10]
tgt_original: 若成就樂根，彼定成就四，餘不定。 若成就苦根，彼定成就七，餘不定。

src_original: aṣṭābhiḥ [051/12]  yaḥ strīndriyeṇa samanvāgataḥ so 'vaśyamaṣṭabhiḥ taiśca saptabhiḥ strīndriyeṇaca / [051/13]  ādiśabdena puruṣendriyadaurmanasyaśaraddhādīnāṃ saṃgrahaḥ / [051/13-051/14]  tadvānapi pratyekamaṣṭābhiḥ samanvāgato bhavati / [051/14]
tgt_original: 若成就憂根，彼定成就八，定不成就一，餘不定。 若成就信根，彼定成就八，餘不定。

src_original: ekādaśabhistvājñājñātendriyānvitaḥ / [051/17]  ājñāta indriyamājñātendriyam / [051/17-051/18]  ya ājñātendriyeṇa samanvāgataḥ so 'vaśyamekādaśabhiḥ sukhasaumanasyopekṣājīvitamanaśraddhādibahirājñendriyeṇa ca / [051/19]
tgt_original: 若成就未知當知根，彼定成就十三，定不成就二，餘不定。 若成就已知根，彼定成就十一，定不成就二，餘不定。 若成就具知根，彼定成就十一，定不成就三，餘不定。
